section_title: Abolition of control of widows’ damages.
section_text: 5 1 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 2 Any money which by virtue of the said section 19 is in court at the commencement of this Act shall, if the person entitled thereto is not under disability and makes an application in that behalf to the court, be paid out to that person.] 3 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .

6 1 This Act may be cited as the Law Reform (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 1971. 2 This Act shall come into operation at the expiration of the period of one month beginning with the date on which it is passed. (3) . . .   this Act does not extend to Northern Ireland.
